import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react'; import { UserContext } from "../UserContext"; import * as icons from 'react-icons/fa'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import * as api from '../library/api'; function Sidebar() { const User = useContext(UserContext); const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const ToggleMobileNavbar = () => { setOpen(!open); } return ( <> {/*
{User ? User.fullname : ""}
  • Home
  • Manage Tasks
  • Manage Users
    • */} {/*
    */}
    {User.fullname}
    • Home
    • Manage Tasks
    • Manage Users
    ); } export default Sidebar;
